articles.title: US asks its citizens to reconsider travelling to India due to COVID-19
articles.description: The new advisory comes after the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) issued a Level-3 Travel Health Notice for India due to COVID-19, indicating a high level of COVID-19 in the country.
articles.content:
The US on Tuesday advised its citizens to reconsider any travel to India due to the current high level of COVID-19 cases in the country.

articles.description: भारत के राष्ट्रपति राम नाथ कोविंद (President Ramnath Kovind) ने मंगलवार शाम गणतंत्र दिवस ( Repulic Day) की पूर्व संध्या पर देश को संबोधित किया। इस मौके पर उन्होंने कहा, "73वें गणतंत्र दिवस की पूर्व संध्या पर, देश और विदेश में रहने वाले आप सभी भारत के लोगों को…

articles.title: Q4 of 2021 records highest ad volumes for a quarter since 2019, up by 27%
articles.description: In the fourth quarter last year, TV registered 489 million seconds of ad volumes, according to Broadcast Audience Research Council India Think report.
articles.content:
Advertising volumes on TV that took a hit in 2020 saw strong recovery last year with the fourth quarter of 2021 recording highest ad volumes for a quarter since 2019.

articles.title: European stocks rebound, Wall Street sinks as Fed meets
articles.description: Minutes from the most recent Fed meeting indicate it will begin lifting interest rates from March with three or possibly four more hikes before the end of the year.
articles.content:
Wall Street stocks sank at the start of trading on Tuesday as the Federal Reserve began a two-day monetary policy meeting, while European stocks rebounded.
